p: The in vivo experiments were conducted on Sprague-Dawley adults albino rats having weight from 170–200 g that were purchased from Rifah Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences Islamabad, Pakistan. The animals were maintained at 22–25 °C with food and fresh water ad libitum. The animals were acclimated to animal house conditions at room temperature around 22–25 °C. The animals were housed three rats per cage with light and dark cycle of about 12 h.
